snippet.title: Vestiges: Fallen Tribes - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Vestiges: Fallen Tribes is a PC and VR strategy card-game mixed with an autobattler in a tribal sci-fi universe.

Wishlist the game: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2511780/Vestiges_Fallen_Tribes/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=desc_link&utm_campaign=announcement&utm_id=vestiges

Subscribe to the newsletter and get the demo as soon as it is available

Vestiges Twitter : https://twitter.com/Vestiges_game
WanadevStudio Twitter : https://twitter.com/WanadevStudio
WanadevStudio Facebook :
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100063962403745
WanadevStudio Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/wanadevstudio/

In a world where water has become rare, lead your clan and face your opponents in strategic PvP battles. Improve your deck of cards, make the right tactical decisions, and place your soldiers on the battlefield so that they take over the enemy’s battalion.

Because Vestiges: Fallen Tribes will be evolving along with the players, it is important for us to build a strong and passionate community around it. Join us on X and Discord to follow the game’s development and subscribe now to our newsletter and be the first to play the demo next month.

#indiegame #ccg  #strategygames
